Hello everyone,

I am heritrix user, and got one problem while crawling the web..i.e. If any 
one specified unknown domain address in seed file, then only 
progress-statistics.log is being updated, and crawler doesn't finish, I have 
tried with checking 5-6 hrs.

Please tell me how to resolve this ?

Thanks
Laxmilal
